mapper.select: SELECT a.code,a.name,a.subjection,a.type,b.wsPlanNumber planNum,b.wsEnrollNumber enrollNum, b.wsLowestScore lowestScore ,b.wsLowestRank lowestRank,b.wsAverageScore averageScore,b.wsAverageRank averageRank FROM gk_university a left join gk_enroll_report b on a.code = b.universityCode where b.year = 2014 and code =#{code}

SELECT a.code,a.name,a.subjection,a.type,b.lgPlanNumber planNum,b.lgEnrollNumber enrollNum, b.lgLowestScore lowestScore ,b.lgLowestRank lowestRank,b.lgAverageScore averageScore,b.lgAverageRank averageRank FROM gk_university a left join gk_enroll_report b on a.code = b.universityCode where b.year = 2014 and code =#{code}
